trans-unit.resname: TSR·1 | Amrou Scout | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Amrou Scout
trans-unit.target: 安罗斥候

trans-unit.resname: TSR·1 | Amrou Scout | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {4}，{T}：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用等于或小于3的反抗军永久物牌，将之放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·1 | Amrou Scout | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The people of Amrou were scattered by war and driven into hiding. Scouts maintain the beacon fires that signal "return" and "home."
trans-unit.target: 安罗人民离散四方以避战火。斥候则看守分别代表了「避难」与「返乡」的信标火焰。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·2 | Amrou Seekers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Amrou Seekers
trans-unit.target: 安罗追寻者

trans-unit.resname: TSR·2 | Amrou Seekers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or white creatures.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME只能被神器生物和／或白色生物阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·2 | Amrou Seekers | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The paradise of Amrou Haven had become a field of cinders. Its people struggled to survive, hoping to see visions of its past in the strange storms that quickly passed.
trans-unit.target: 曾如仙境的安罗庇护地已化为遍野灰烬。其间人民挣扎求生，希望能见到奇异风暴中惊鸿一瞥的过往美景。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·3 | Angel of Salvation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Angel of Salvation
trans-unit.target: 救助天使

trans-unit.resname: TSR·3 | Angel of Salvation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flash; convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
trans-unit.target: 闪现；召集（此咒语能用你的生物来协助施放。你于施放此咒语时每横置一个生物，就能为此咒语支付{1}或一点该生物颜色之法术力。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·3 | Angel of Salvation | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: TSR·3 | Angel of Salvation | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of targets, divided as you choose.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，防止本回合中接下来将对任意数量的目标造成之共5点伤害，你可以任意分配。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·4 | Angel's Grace | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Angel's Grace
trans-unit.target: 天使恩典

trans-unit.resname: TSR·4 | Angel's Grace | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
trans-unit.target: 转瞬（只要此咒语在堆叠上，牌手便不能施放咒语或起动不是法术力异能的异能。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·4 | Angel's Grace | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: You can't lose the game this turn and your opponents can't win the game this turn. Until end of turn, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.
trans-unit.target: 本回合中，你这盘游戏不会输，对手也不会赢。直到回合结束，将使你的总生命减少至1以下的伤害，改为将它减少至1。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·5 | Aven Mindcensor | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: If an opponent would search a library, that player searches the top four cards of that library instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果某对手将搜寻某牌库，则改为他搜寻该牌库顶的四张牌。

trans-unit.source: "My people swore to protect Benalia to the end. It is battered, but yet stands, as do we."
trans-unit.target: 「我城人民誓死保卫宾纳里亚。城墙虽已破旧，依然屹立不摇；吾人亦如是。」

trans-unit.resname: TSR·14 | Children of Korlis | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We have a proud history of self-sacrifice. But it is easy, in these bleak times, to find one among us who is eager to die for any cause."\n—Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis
trans-unit.target: 「我们拥有自我牺牲的光荣传统。但在这凄凉年代，要找出愿意为任何理由舍身者，并不是太难。」\n～寇利斯侍僧塔瓦勒

trans-unit.source: "Teferi snapped his fingers, and the viashino started clucking like a chicken. Silly, yes, but exactly the thing we needed to break the stifling tension."\n—Jhoira, master artificer
trans-unit.target: 「泰菲力一弹指，那凡尔西诺便像只鸡似地开始喀喀叫。这确实是挺蠢的，但也成功地化解了令人窒息的紧张气氛。」\n～神器大师尤依拉

trans-unit.resname: TSR·54 | Bonded Fetch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bonded Fetch

trans-unit.source: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·54 | Bonded Fetch | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A well-made homunculus grooms the mind of its master, pruning the thoughts that lead to madness. Few loredelvers survive the study of the infinite without one.
trans-unit.target: 优秀的造妖能打理主人的心灵，过滤引致疯狂的思绪。研究无限学的论典师若不作此准备，活下来的机会很低。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·55 | Brine Elemental | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 变身{5}{U}{U}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·55 | Brine Elemental | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME翻回正面时，每位对手各略过其下一个重置步骤。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·55 | Brine Elemental | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Water calls to water, and the world is left exhausted and withered in its wake.
trans-unit.target: 水分凝聚汇流，遗下一片干枯世界。

trans-unit.target: 细心考虑

trans-unit.resname: TSR·56 | Careful Consideration | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player draws four cards, then discards three cards. If you cast this spell during your main phase, instead that player draws four cards, then discards two cards.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓四张牌，然后弃三张牌。如果你是在你的行动阶段施放此咒语，则改为该牌手抓四张牌，然后弃两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·56 | Careful Consideration | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Sages who take the time to verify their sources are rewarded for their diligence."\n—Jhoira, to Teferi
trans-unit.target: 「愿花时间核对来源的智者，都会因勤勉而获益。」\n～尤依拉致泰菲力

trans-unit.resname: TSR·61 | Delay | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. If the spell is countered this way, exile it with three time counters on it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of its owner's upkeep, remove a time counter from that card. When the last is removed, the player plays it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。如果以此法反击该咒语，则改为将它放逐且上面有三个计时指示物，而非置入其拥有者的坟墓场。如果它原本不具有延缓，则它获得延缓异能。（在其拥有者的维持开始时，从该牌上移去一个指示物。当移去最后一个时，该牌手施放它且不需支付其法术力费用。若它是生物，则它具有敏捷。）

trans-unit.source: "The undead are not 'awakened.' They are evicted when there is no room left in the pit for more bodies."
trans-unit.target: 「不死生物并非给『唤醒』。它们是因暗渊挤不下新尸体而被赶出来的。」

trans-unit.resname: TSR·131 | Premature Burial | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: TSR·131 | Premature Burial | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This soil knows well the taste of the dead. Give it the hunger for a living meal, and it can become a deadly ally."\n—Ezrith, druid of the Dark Hours
trans-unit.target: 「这土壤熟知死者的气味。若点醒它生食的欲望，便可成为强力盟友。」\n～黯刻德鲁伊易季司

trans-unit.resname: TSR·133 | Rathi Trapper | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 缠藤臭泥，瘫毒匍尸。沼泽是自然的陷阱，等待违逆自然的心灵前来开拓。

trans-unit.target: 脊柱神医

trans-unit.resname: TSR·134 | Ridged Kusite | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It offers but a taste of the power that the shadows have to offer. But even that is a heady wine indeed."\n—Ratadrabik of Urborg
trans-unit.target: 「黑暗只不过拿出一点点力量让人品尝而已。但就算如此，那滋味已足以令人迷醉。」\n～乌尔博格的拉塔札比

trans-unit.resname: TSR·139 | Smallpox | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: TSR·183 | Riddle of Lightning | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose any target. Scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. CARDNAME deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to that permanent or player.
trans-unit.target: 选择任意一个目标。占卜3，然后展示你的牌库顶牌。CARDNAME对该永久物或牌手造成伤害，其数量等同于所展示之牌的总法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: Suspend 1—{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {R} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

trans-unit.resname: TSR·209 | Heartwood Storyteller | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: His roots reach deep, nurtured not by soil and rain, but by millennia of experience.
trans-unit.target: 他的根扎得极深，所吸收的养分并非来自土壤或雨水，而是藉由积累千年的经验。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·210 | Hypergenesis | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hypergenesis
trans-unit.target: 多重创生

trans-unit.resname: TSR·210 | Hypergenesis | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Suspend 3—{1}{G}{G}

trans-unit.resname: TSR·210 | Hypergenesis | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Starting with you, each player may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield. Repeat this process until no one puts a card onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 由你开始，每位牌手各可以将一张神器，生物，结界或地牌从其手上放进战场。重复此流程，直到没有人将牌放进战场为止。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·211 | Imperiosaur | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Imperiosaur
trans-unit.target: 骄暴龙

trans-unit.resname: TSR·211 | Imperiosaur | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Spend only mana produced by basic lands to cast this spell.
trans-unit.target: 只能以基本地产生的法术力来施放此咒语。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·211 | Imperiosaur | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "An ancient, powerful force has overtaken the valley. I sympathize for its former inhabitants, but I rejoice for the land itself."\n—Olanti, Muraganda druid
trans-unit.target: 「有个古老的强大势力接管了山谷。我同情此地过往的居民，却替大地欢欣不已。」\n～莫甘达德鲁伊欧蓝蒂

trans-unit.resname: TSR·212 | Kavu Primarch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kavu Primarch
trans-unit.target: 卡甫大君

trans-unit.resname: TSR·212 | Kavu Primarch | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
trans-unit.target: 增幅{4}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{4}。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·212 | Kavu Primarch | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
trans-unit.target: 召集（此咒语能用你的生物来协助施放。你于施放此咒语时每横置一个生物，就能为此咒语支付{1}或一点该生物颜色之法术力。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·212 | Kavu Primarch | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME was kicked, it enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 如果CARDNAME已增幅，则它进战场时上面有四个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·213 | Keen Sense | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Keen Sense
trans-unit.target: 敏锐直觉

trans-unit.resname: TSR·213 | Keen Sense | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物

trans-unit.resname: TSR·213 | Keen Sense | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当所结附的生物向任一对手造成伤害时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·213 | Keen Sense | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Crovax sensed that Mirri wasn't ready for the curse taking hold of her. Weeping in his heart, he fled.
trans-unit.target: 寇维克斯感觉到米丽没能抵受向她袭来的诅咒。他心中淌着血，就此逃离。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·214 | Krosan Grip | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Krosan Grip
trans-unit.target: 克洛萨之攫

trans-unit.resname: TSR·214 | Krosan Grip | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
trans-unit.target: 转瞬（只要此咒语在堆叠上，牌手便不能施放咒语或起动不是法术力异能的异能。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·214 | Krosan Grip | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器或结界。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·214 | Krosan Grip | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Give up these unnatural weapons, these scrolls. Heart and mind and fist are enough."\n—Zyd, Kamahlite druid
trans-unit.target: 「放弃那些违逆自然的武器与卷轴吧。心，意，拳，这便够了。」\n～卡马尔宗德鲁伊季德

trans-unit.resname: TSR·215 | Life and Limb | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Life and Limb
trans-unit.target: 气蕴四体

trans-unit.resname: TSR·215 | Life and Limb | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All Forests and all Saprolings are 1/1 green Saproling creatures and Forest lands in addition to their other types. (They're affected by summoning sickness.)
trans-unit.target: 所有树林与所有腐生物都是1/1绿色腐生物生物和树林地，且仍具有原本类别。（它们会受召唤失调影响。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·215 | Life and Limb | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It was a sight of pain and awe—a twisted forest, migrating across the salt plain in search of richer soil."\n—Edahlis, greenseeker
trans-unit.target: 「这是令人心痛却又畏服的景象～整片扭曲变形的树林横越盐化平原，寻找更肥沃的土壤。」\n～寻碧者艾达黎

trans-unit.resname: TSR·216 | Llanowar Mentor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Llanowar Mentor
trans-unit.target: 罗堰明师

trans-unit.resname: TSR·216 | Llanowar Mentor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 green Elf Druid creature token named Llanowar Elves. It has "{T}: Add {G}."
trans-unit.target: {G}，{T}，弃一张牌：派出一个1/1绿色，名称为罗堰妖精的妖精／德鲁伊衍生生物。它具有「{T}：加{G}。」

trans-unit.resname: TSR·216 | Llanowar Mentor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "One day the vines of this forest will be as much a part of you as your own fingers."
trans-unit.target: 「总有一天，这树林中的藤蔓就会像你的手指一样，成为你身体的一部分。」

trans-unit.resname: TSR·217 | Might of Old Krosa | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Might of Old Krosa
trans-unit.target: 古克洛萨之力

trans-unit.resname: TSR·217 | Might of Old Krosa | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If you cast this spell during your main phase, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。如果你是在你的行动阶段施放此咒语，则改为该生物得+4/+4直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·217 | Might of Old Krosa | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Sometimes even humble forest creatures were gifted with mighty emanations from the past.
trans-unit.target: 有时就连卑微的树林生物都会蒙受过往放射之力。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·218 | Might Sliver | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Might Sliver
trans-unit.target: 瀚力裂片妖

trans-unit.resname: TSR·218 | Might Sliver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All Sliver creatures get +2/+2.
trans-unit.target: 所有裂片妖生物得+2/+2。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·218 | Might Sliver | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The colossal thing rumbled over the ridge, tree husks crumbling before it. The ones we were already fighting howled as it came, their muscles suddenly surging, and we knew it was time to flee."\n—Llanach, Skyshroud ranger
trans-unit.target: 「那庞然大物自山脊隆隆而过，树干应声而倒。正与我们缠斗的家伙见状长嚎，身上隆起大块肌肉；我们知道该逃了。」\n～天帷护林兵拉纳可

trans-unit.resname: TSR·219 | Mire Boa | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mire Boa
trans-unit.target: 泥沼蟒蛇

trans-unit.resname: TSR·219 | Mire Boa | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
trans-unit.target: 沼泽行者（只要防御牌手操控沼泽，此生物便不能被阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·219 | Mire Boa | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {G}: Regenerate CARDNAME. (The next time this creature would be destroyed, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)
trans-unit.target: {G}：重生CARDNAME。（此生物下一次将被消灭时，改为将它横置、移出战斗，并治愈其上所有伤害。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·220 | Muraganda Petroglyphs | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Muraganda Petroglyphs
trans-unit.target: 莫甘达岩画

trans-unit.resname: TSR·220 | Muraganda Petroglyphs | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures with no abilities get +2/+2.
trans-unit.target: 没有异能的生物得+2/+2。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·220 | Muraganda Petroglyphs | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some mages forsake their scrolls and libraries to learn at the feet of ancient trees and sacred stones.
trans-unit.target: 某些法师丢下了卷轴与藏书，转而求教于古树圣石。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·221 | Nantuko Shaman | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nantuko Shaman
trans-unit.target: 螳人祭师

trans-unit.resname: TSR·221 | Nantuko Shaman | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you control no tapped lands, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若你未操控已横置的地，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·221 | Nantuko Shaman | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Suspend 1—{2}{G}{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{G}{G} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)
trans-unit.target: 延缓1～{2}{G}{G}（除了从你手上施放此牌，你可以支付{2}{G}{G}并将它放逐，且上面有一个计时指示物。在你的维持开始时，从其上移去一个计时指示物。当移去最后一个时，施放它且不需支付其法术力费用。它具有敏捷。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·222 | Pendelhaven Elder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pendelhaven Elder
trans-unit.target: 潘得庇护地长老

trans-unit.source: {T}: Each 1/1 creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}：每个由你操控的1/1生物各得+1/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·222 | Pendelhaven Elder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The elder who carries the ancestral mantle of Jacques le Vert is tasked with his ancient mission: to protect the creatures of Pendelhaven.
trans-unit.target: 披上碧友贾克传世披风的长老，都继承他的长远使命：保护潘得庇护地之生灵。

trans-unit.source: Penumbra Spider
trans-unit.target: 罔两蜘蛛

trans-unit.resname: TSR·223 | Penumbra Spider | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 延势

trans-unit.resname: TSR·223 | Penumbra Spider | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, create a 2/4 black Spider creature token with reach.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，派出一个2/4黑色，具延势异能的蜘蛛衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·223 | Penumbra Spider | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When it snared a passing cockatrice, its own soul darkly doubled.
trans-unit.target: 当它瞪着飞过头顶的石化鸡蛇时，其另一个灵魂从暗地冒出。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·224 | Phantom Wurm | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 幽魅亚龙

trans-unit.resname: TSR·224 | Phantom Wurm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有四个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·224 | Phantom Wurm | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If damage would be dealt to CARDNAME, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 如果CARDNAME将受到伤害，则防止该伤害。从CARDNAME上移去一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·224 | Phantom Wurm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It died with the forest, yet both linger on in twisted form.
trans-unit.target: 它与树林一同死亡，却均以扭曲形式茍存。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·225 | Primal Forcemage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Primal Forcemage
trans-unit.target: 原初力法师

trans-unit.resname: TSR·225 | Primal Forcemage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，该生物得+3/+3直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·225 | Primal Forcemage | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Their calls unheeded by the withered forests, nature shamans channeled the life force of their brethren.
trans-unit.target: 枯萎树林不再任其呼令，自然祭师转而连通其弟兄的生命力量。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·226 | Reflex Sliver | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reflex Sliver
trans-unit.target: 反射裂片妖

trans-unit.resname: TSR·226 | Reflex Sliver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All Sliver creatures have haste.
trans-unit.target: 所有裂片妖生物具有敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·226 | Reflex Sliver | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This sliver comes into the world a perfect predator. It's ready to hunt and devour its first meal within seconds of hatching."\n—Rukarumel, field journal
trans-unit.target: 「此类裂片妖是天生的完美掠食者。才孵化出来不久，就准备好要猎杀、吞噬自己的第一餐。」\n～陆卡陆梅的现场日志

trans-unit.resname: TSR·227 | Scryb Ranger | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Return a Forest you control to its owner's hand: Untap target creature. Activate this ability only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: 将一个由你操控的树林移回其拥有者手上：重置目标生物。此异能每回合只能起动一次。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·228 | Seal of Primordium | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 原基缄印

trans-unit.resname: TSR·228 | Seal of Primordium | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：消灭目标神器或结界。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·228 | Seal of Primordium | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I am the simplifier, the root that drags all artifice to earth."\n—Seal inscription
trans-unit.target: 「吾乃释繁者，是为匡俗济世之本始。」\n～缄印铭文

trans-unit.target: 为来日探寻

trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·229 | Search for Tomorrow | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Suspend 2—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 延缓2～{G}（除了从你手上施放此牌，你可以支付{G}并将它放逐，且上面有两个计时指示物。在你的维持开始时，从其上移去一个计时指示物。当移去最后一个时，施放它且不需支付其法术力费用。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·230 | Spinneret Sliver | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Spinneret Sliver
trans-unit.target: 丝疣裂片妖

trans-unit.source: All Sliver creatures have reach.
trans-unit.target: 所有裂片妖生物具有延势异能。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·230 | Spinneret Sliver | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Each new generation of slivers evolves to assimilate the strengths of the prey upon which their progenitors fed.
trans-unit.target: 裂片妖能吸收所捕食的猎物长处，演化出新一代品种。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·231 | Sporesower Thallid | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 从CARDNAME上移去三个芽孢指示物：派出一个1/1绿色腐生物衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·232 | Sporoloth Ancient | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物具有「从此生物上移去两个芽孢指示物：派出一个1/1绿色腐生物衍生生物。」

trans-unit.resname: TSR·233 | Strength in Numbers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Strength in Numbers
trans-unit.target: 人多力量大

trans-unit.resname: TSR·233 | Strength in Numbers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +X/+X, where X is the number of attacking creatures.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物获得践踏异能且得+X/+X，X为进行攻击的生物数量。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·233 | Strength in Numbers | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The hermit dies. The outcast dies. The lone wolf dies. Only those who stick together survive this world."\n—Uros, Pendelhaven elder
trans-unit.target: 「隐者已死。黜人已死。独行狼已死。这世界只有团结一致者才能生存。」\n～潘得庇护地长老尤洛斯

trans-unit.resname: TSR·234 | Summoner's Pact | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: TSR·235 | Tarmogoyf | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: What doesn't grow, dies. And what dies grows the tarmogoyf.
trans-unit.target: 没能壮大者会死去。而死者壮大了塔莫耶夫。

trans-unit.source: "The sight of my thallids still thriving is a bittersweet welcome to this cold waste."

trans-unit.target: 所有裂片妖生物具有剧毒1。（每当一个裂片妖对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手得到一个中毒指示物。具十个或更多中毒指示物的牌手会输掉这盘游戏。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·247 | Yavimaya Dryad | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The parched earth still shielded those few souls with the heart to call it home.
trans-unit.target: 干枯大地依旧保护这少数诚心为家园奉献的灵魂。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·249 | Darkheart Sliver | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "At first we thought we were in some haunted wood. Then the branches twisted and scuttled toward us."\n—Merrik Aidar, Benalish patrol
trans-unit.target: 「我们一开始还以为正置身闹鬼丛林中。然后树枝扭曲变形，快速地向我们伸过来。」\n～宾纳里亚巡卫梅里可艾达

trans-unit.resname: TSR·250 | Dormant Sliver | Flavor Text

trans-unit.source: "They are here, and they are hungry. And what they do not eat, they burn. Yavimaya is lost. We must leave now for Skyshroud."\n—Edahlis, greenseeker
trans-unit.target: 「他们饥肠辘辘地来到这里。不能吃的东西就烧掉。亚维马雅已经完了。我们该立刻到天帷去。」\n～寻碧者艾达黎

trans-unit.resname: TSR·253 | Glittering Wish | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She wished for gold, but not for the strength to carry it.

trans-unit.resname: TSR·254 | Harmonic Sliver | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Since the last sliver arrived, even our mightiest relics splinter into shards as soon as we bring them against the hive."\n—Llanach, Skyshroud ranger
trans-unit.target: 「自从最后一种裂片妖加入战团后，我们用来对抗母巢的强力遗物才刚启用便应声碎裂。」\n～天帷护林兵拉纳可

(At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from that card. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)
trans-unit.target: {2}，从你手上放逐一张非地牌：在所放逐之牌上放置四个计时指示物。如果它原本不具有延缓，则它获得延缓异能。（在你的维持开始时，从该牌上移去一个计时指示物。当移去最后一个时，施放它且不需支付其法术力费用。若它是生物，则它具有敏捷。）

trans-unit.source: "Rats and jackals feast in his swath, but even they will not walk with him."\n—Mangara

trans-unit.resname: TSR·258 | Necrotic Sliver | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Though Volrath is long dead, the slivers have become everything he wanted them to be: mindless instruments of destruction and despair.
trans-unit.target: 瓦拉司虽早已败亡，他对裂片妖的期待却已实现：他们已是制造毁灭与绝望的无情工具。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·259 | Radha, Heir to Keld | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Run home, cur. I've already taken your master's head. Don't make me thrash you with it."
trans-unit.target: 「喂，快滚回家。你老大的头在我手上。别逼我拿它砸过去。」

trans-unit.resname: TSR·260 | Saffi Eriksdotter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In the blink of an eye, she strode from deep snow to dusty waste. From the crease of light behind her, a voice rang hollow: "Saffi, wait for me . . . ."
trans-unit.target: 转眼之间，她便从深雪大地奔赴扬尘荒野。从她身后曳光之中，一个声音孤单地回荡着：「莎妃，等等我. . .。」

trans-unit.resname: TSR·261 | Sliver Legion | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: TSR·261 | Sliver Legion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Hidden within the clicking, chittering swarm is a unique mind, still young, but growing more aware as time passes.
trans-unit.target: 藏身于这喀嚓喧嚣大群之内的，是颗独特的年轻心灵，且阅历与时俱进。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·262 | Akroma's Memorial | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "No rest. No mercy. No matter what."\n—Memorial inscription

trans-unit.target: 「虽然他俩的理念南辕北辙，克撒与米斯拉所造之物却高度地彼此呼应。」\n～托卡西雅的日志片段

trans-unit.resname: TSR·289 | Vesuva | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vesuva
trans-unit.target: 维苏瓦

trans-unit.resname: TSR·289 | Vesuva | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may have CARDNAME enter the battlefield tapped as a copy of any land on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使CARDNAME当成战场上任一地的复制品来横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·289 | Vesuva | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It is everywhere you've ever been.
trans-unit.target: 它是你曾到过的所有地方。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·290 | Ajani's Pridemate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ajani's Pridemate
trans-unit.target: 阿耶尼的群伴

trans-unit.resname: TSR·290 | Ajani's Pridemate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当你获得生命时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·290 | Ajani's Pridemate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "When one of us prospers, the pride prospers."\n—Jazal Goldmane
trans-unit.target: 「只要一个享福，整群都能享福。」\n～金鬃贾佐

trans-unit.resname: TSR·291 | Banishing Light | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Banishing Light
trans-unit.target: 驱逐明光

trans-unit.resname: TSR·291 | Banishing Light | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控的非地永久物，直到CARDNAME离开战场为止。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·292 | Containment Priest | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Containment Priest
trans-unit.target: 围护僧侣

trans-unit.resname: TSR·292 | Containment Priest | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flash
trans-unit.target: 闪现

trans-unit.resname: TSR·292 | Containment Priest | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If a nontoken creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果某非衍生物的生物将进战场，且未有牌手施放之，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·292 | Containment Priest | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some protection requires a bit of finesse.
trans-unit.target: 有些保护需要无微不至。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·293 | Ethereal Armor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ethereal Armor
trans-unit.target: 空灵铠

trans-unit.resname: TSR·293 | Ethereal Armor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物

trans-unit.resname: TSR·293 | Ethereal Armor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control and has first strike.
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物具有先攻异能，且你每操控一个结界，它便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·293 | Ethereal Armor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Metal is scarce, smiths are pricey, and plate mail is heavy.
trans-unit.target: 金属难寻，工匠昂贵，而铠甲又笨重。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·294 | Flickerwisp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Flickerwisp
trans-unit.target: 明灭翔灵

trans-unit.resname: TSR·294 | Flickerwisp | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: TSR·294 | Flickerwisp | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐另一个目标永久物。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将所放逐之牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·294 | Flickerwisp | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Its wings disturb more than air.
trans-unit.target: 其翅翼比所卷起的气流更扰乱人心。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·295 | Intangible Virtue | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Intangible Virtue
trans-unit.target: 无形美善

trans-unit.resname: TSR·295 | Intangible Virtue | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的衍生生物得+1/+1且具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·295 | Intangible Virtue | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In life, they were a motley crew: farmers, lords, cutpurses, priests. In death, they are united in singular, benevolent purpose.
trans-unit.target: 他们生时是各式各样的成员：农夫，地主，扒手，僧侣。他们死后则结合成单一的仁爱趋力。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·296 | Lingering Souls | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lingering Souls
trans-unit.target: 徘徊灵魂

trans-unit.resname: TSR·296 | Lingering Souls | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
trans-unit.target: 派出两个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·296 | Lingering Souls | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 返照{1}{B}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·297 | Mirror Entity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mirror Entity
trans-unit.target: 镜身灵

trans-unit.resname: TSR·297 | Mirror Entity | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
trans-unit.target: 化形（此牌是所有生物类别。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·297 | Mirror Entity | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {X}: Until end of turn, creatures you control have base power and toughness X/X and gain all creature types.
trans-unit.target: {X}：直到回合结束，由你操控的生物之基础力量与防御力为X/X且获得所有生物类别。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·297 | Mirror Entity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Unaware of Lorwyn's diversity, it sees only itself, reflected a thousand times over.
trans-unit.target: 它没察觉洛温的多彩样貌，视线中只有自己投向自己、反射千遍的视线。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·298 | Palace Jailer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Palace Jailer
trans-unit.target: 宫殿狱卒

trans-unit.resname: TSR·298 | Palace Jailer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你成为君主。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·298 | Palace Jailer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until an opponent becomes the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控的生物，直到任一对手成为君主为止。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·299 | Path to Exile | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Path to Exile
trans-unit.target: 流放之径

trans-unit.resname: TSR·299 | Path to Exile | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle their library.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标生物。其操控者可以从其牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将该牌横置放进战场，然后将其牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·300 | Restoration Angel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Restoration Angel
trans-unit.target: 复归天使

trans-unit.resname: TSR·300 | Restoration Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flash
trans-unit.target: 闪现

trans-unit.resname: TSR·300 | Restoration Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: TSR·300 | Restoration Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Angel creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以放逐目标由你操控的非天使生物，然后将该牌在你的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·301 | Sigil of the Empty Throne | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sigil of the Empty Throne
trans-unit.target: 虚位印记

trans-unit.resname: TSR·301 | Sigil of the Empty Throne | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放结界咒语时，派出一个4/4白色，具飞行异能的天使衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·301 | Sigil of the Empty Throne | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When Asha left Bant, she ensured that the world would have protection and order in her absence.
trans-unit.target: 当亚莎离开班特时，她确信即使自己不在，这世界依旧能拥有保护与秩序。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·302 | Silence | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Silence
trans-unit.target: 封口

trans-unit.resname: TSR·302 | Silence | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Your opponents can't cast spells this turn.
trans-unit.target: 所有对手本回合都不能施放咒语。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·302 | Silence | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Take a quiet moment to reflect on your sins."\n—Cleph, Order of Redeemed Souls
trans-unit.target: 「用寂静片刻反省身负罪恶。」\n～获赎灵魂教团的克雷夫

trans-unit.resname: TSR·303 | Sram, Senior Edificer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sram, Senior Edificer
trans-unit.target: 资深建筑师斯勒姆

trans-unit.resname: TSR·303 | Sram, Senior Edificer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an Aura, Equipment, or Vehicle spell, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放灵气，武具或载具咒语时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·303 | Sram, Senior Edificer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "As this conflict grows, it gets harder to prevent the city from breaking down. How much longer can we keep this machinery balanced?"
trans-unit.target: 「随着冲突愈演愈烈，眼下越来越难维持城市完整不至毁坏。这样的机械平衡还能维持多久？」

trans-unit.resname: TSR·304 | Stonehorn Dignitary | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stonehorn Dignitary
trans-unit.target: 石角显贵

trans-unit.resname: TSR·304 | Stonehorn Dignitary | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target opponent skips their next combat phase.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标对手略过其下一个战斗阶段。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·304 | Stonehorn Dignitary | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It did not escape the ambassador's notice that the sound of war drums could also marshal the city to attention.
trans-unit.target: 大使并没忽略掉：隆隆战鼓也能引领整城的目光。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·305 | Thraben Inspector | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thraben Inspector
trans-unit.target: 瑟班巡检官

trans-unit.resname: TSR·305 | Thraben Inspector | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，探查。（派出一个无色线索衍生神器，且具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌。」）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·305 | Thraben Inspector | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If you've been at this as long as I have, nothing can surprise you. That's the hope, at least."
trans-unit.target: 「如果你也和我一样在这行干了这么多年，那应该没东西能吓到你了。至少这也算是希望吧。」

trans-unit.resname: TSR·306 | Baral, Chief of Compliance | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Baral, Chief of Compliance
trans-unit.target: 监察长巴罗

trans-unit.resname: TSR·306 | Baral, Chief of Compliance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: 你施放的瞬间与法术咒语减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·306 | Baral, Chief of Compliance | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a spell or ability you control counters a spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当由你操控的咒语或异能将咒语反击时，你可以抓一张牌。若你如此作，则弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·306 | Baral, Chief of Compliance | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The echo of silence is music to my ears."
trans-unit.target: 「寂静回响是我耳中天籁。」

trans-unit.resname: TSR·307 | Disdainful Stroke | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Disdainful Stroke
trans-unit.target: 倨傲击

trans-unit.resname: TSR·307 | Disdainful Stroke | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 4 or greater.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标总法术力费用等于或大于4的咒语。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·307 | Disdainful Stroke | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You are beneath contempt. Your lineage will be forgotten."
trans-unit.target: 「你实在不值一提。你的血统也将被人遗忘。」

trans-unit.resname: TSR·308 | Fblthp, the Lost | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fblthp, the Lost
trans-unit.target: 迷途的夫毕佐

trans-unit.resname: TSR·308 | Fblthp, the Lost | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card. If it entered from your library or was cast from your library, draw two cards instead.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓一张牌。若它是从你的牌库进入战场或是从你的牌库施放，则改为抓两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·308 | Fblthp, the Lost | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Fblthp becomes the target of a spell, shuffle Fblthp into its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 当夫毕佐成为咒语的目标时，将夫毕佐洗入其拥有者的牌库。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·309 | Laboratory Maniac | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Laboratory Maniac
trans-unit.target: 实验室狂人

trans-unit.resname: TSR·309 | Laboratory Maniac | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将抓一张牌但牌库没有牌，则改为你赢得这盘游戏。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·309 | Laboratory Maniac | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: His mind whirled with grand plans, never thinking of what might happen if he were to succeed.
trans-unit.target: 他脑海飞舞着伟大计划，却从没想过如果成功了会发生什么事。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·310 | Master of the Pearl Trident | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Master of the Pearl Trident
trans-unit.target: 珍珠三叉戟大师

trans-unit.resname: TSR·310 | Master of the Pearl Trident | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他人鱼生物得+1/+1且具有海岛行者异能。（只要防御牌手操控海岛，它们便不能被阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·310 | Master of the Pearl Trident | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Let the land dwellers know the coast is no longer the border between our realms. A new age of empire has begun."
trans-unit.target: 「让陆地的居民明白，海岸已不再是我们之间的疆界。新的帝国时代已经开始。」

trans-unit.resname: TSR·311 | Mulldrifter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mulldrifter
trans-unit.target: 漂念精

trans-unit.resname: TSR·311 | Mulldrifter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw two cards.

trans-unit.resname: TSR·311 | Mulldrifter | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
trans-unit.target: 呼魂{2}{U}（你可以支付此咒语的呼魂费用来施放它。若你如此作，当它进战场时便牺牲之。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·312 | Mystic Confluence | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mystic Confluence
trans-unit.target: 秘法交汇

trans-unit.resname: TSR·312 | Mystic Confluence | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
trans-unit.target: 选择三项。你可以多次选择同一项。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·312 | Mystic Confluence | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
trans-unit.target: •除非目标咒语的操控者支付{3}，否则反击之。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·312 | Mystic Confluence | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Return target creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: •将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·312 | Mystic Confluence | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: • Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: •抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·313 | Ninja of the Deep Hours | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ninja of the Deep Hours
trans-unit.target: 深夜忍者

trans-unit.resname: TSR·313 | Ninja of the Deep Hours | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Ninjutsu {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
trans-unit.target: 忍术{1}{U}（{1}{U}，将一个由你操控且未受阻挡的攻击生物移回其拥有者手上：将此牌从你手上横置放进战场，且正进行攻击。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·313 | Ninja of the Deep Hours | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·314 | Paradoxical Outcome | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Paradoxical Outcome
trans-unit.target: 矛盾结果

trans-unit.resname: TSR·314 | Paradoxical Outcome | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return any number of target nonland, nontoken permanents you control to their owners' hands. Draw a card for each card returned to your hand this way.
trans-unit.target: 将任意数量目标由你操控且既非地也非衍生物的永久物移回其拥有者手上。每以此法将一张牌移回你手上，便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·314 | Paradoxical Outcome | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The results of Rashmi's experimentation forced her to consider the possibility that multitudinous realities existed beyond her own.
trans-unit.target: 由于实验结果，列施蜜禁不住思考：除了她所处的现实以外，是否还有许多现实存在。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·315 | Ponder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ponder
trans-unit.target: 沉思

trans-unit.resname: TSR·315 | Ponder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的三张牌，然后将它们以任意顺序放回。你可以将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·315 | Ponder | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·316 | Remand | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Remand
trans-unit.target: 奉还

trans-unit.resname: TSR·316 | Remand | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it into its owner's hand instead of into that player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。如果以此法反击该咒语，则改为将它置于其拥有者手上，而非置入该牌手的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·316 | Remand | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·316 | Remand | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Well, at least all of that arm-waving and arcane babbling you did was impressive."
trans-unit.target: 「嗯，至少你挥舞的手势与连串咕哝让我印象很深刻。」

trans-unit.resname: TSR·317 | Repeal | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Repeal
trans-unit.target: 撤回

trans-unit.resname: TSR·317 | Repeal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target nonland permanent with converted mana cost X to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 将目标总法术力费用为X的非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·317 | Repeal | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·317 | Repeal | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Your deed cannot be undone. You, however, can be."\n—Agosto, Azorius imperator
trans-unit.target: 「你的约定不能毁弃。但你，倒是可以。」\n～俄佐立将军阿果托

trans-unit.resname: TSR·318 | Talrand, Sky Summoner | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Talrand, Sky Summoner
trans-unit.target: 空召师陶岚

trans-unit.resname: TSR·318 | Talrand, Sky Summoner | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放瞬间或法术咒语时，派出一个2/2蓝色，具飞行异能的龙兽衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·318 | Talrand, Sky Summoner | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The seas are vast, but the skies are even more so. Why be content with one kingdom when I can rule them both?"
trans-unit.target: 「大海浩瀚，但天空更加无际。如果我能同时统治两者，又何必只安于其一？」

trans-unit.resname: TSR·319 | Treasure Cruise | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Treasure Cruise
trans-unit.target: 宝船巡游

trans-unit.resname: TSR·319 | Treasure Cruise | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
trans-unit.target: 掘穴（你于施放此咒语时每从你坟墓场中放逐一张牌，就能为此咒语支付{1}。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·319 | Treasure Cruise | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·319 | Treasure Cruise | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Countless delights drift on the surface while dark schemes run below.
trans-unit.target: 金玉漂流在外，阴谋勾画其间。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·320 | Trinket Mage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Trinket Mage
trans-unit.target: 琐物法师

trans-unit.resname: TSR·320 | Trinket Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用等于或小于1的神器牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·321 | True-Name Nemesis | Card Name
trans-unit.source: True-Name Nemesis
trans-unit.target: 真名宿敌

trans-unit.resname: TSR·321 | True-Name Nemesis | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a player.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一位牌手。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·321 | True-Name Nemesis | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has protection from the chosen player.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME具有反该牌手保护异能。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·322 | Dismember | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dismember
trans-unit.target: 肢解

trans-unit.resname: TSR·322 | Dismember | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: ({PB} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
trans-unit.target: （{B/P}可用{B}或2点生命来支付。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·322 | Dismember | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-5/-5直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·322 | Dismember | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You serve Phyrexia. Your pieces would better serve Phyrexia elsewhere."\n—Azax-Azog, the Demon Thane
trans-unit.target: 「你会服侍非瑞克西亚。你的碎块会在他处将非瑞克西亚服侍得更好。」\n～恶魔伯爵亚札佐

trans-unit.resname: TSR·323 | Gray Merchant of Asphodel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gray Merchant of Asphodel
trans-unit.target: 安福陵的暗贾

trans-unit.resname: TSR·323 | Gray Merchant of Asphodel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each opponent loses X life, where X is your devotion to black. You gain life equal to the life lost this way. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，每位对手各失去X点生命，X为你的黑色献力。你获得若干生命，其数量等同于以此法失去的生命总和。（由你操控之永久物的法术力费用当中每含有一个{B}，你的黑色献力就加一。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·324 | Gurmag Angler | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gurmag Angler
trans-unit.target: 谷尔玛钓客

trans-unit.resname: TSR·324 | Gurmag Angler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
trans-unit.target: 掘穴（你于施放此咒语时每从你坟墓场中放逐一张牌，就能为此咒语支付{1}。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·324 | Gurmag Angler | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: If everything in the Gurmag Swamp hungers for human flesh, what bait could be more effective?
trans-unit.target: 如果谷尔玛沼泽里所有东西都想吃人肉，还有比它更有效的饵吗？

trans-unit.resname: TSR·325 | Harvester of Souls | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Harvester of Souls
trans-unit.target: 索命恶魔

trans-unit.resname: TSR·325 | Harvester of Souls | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 死触

trans-unit.resname: TSR·325 | Harvester of Souls | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个非衍生物的生物死去时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·325 | Harvester of Souls | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "He is judge, jury, and executioner because he killed them all."\n—Bishop Cawle of Elgaud
trans-unit.target: 「他身兼法官，陪审团与行刑人，因为全被他杀了。」\n～艾尔告主教考尔

trans-unit.resname: TSR·326 | Leyline of the Void | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Leyline of the Void
trans-unit.target: 虚空地脉

trans-unit.resname: TSR·326 | Leyline of the Void | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的起手牌中包含了CARDNAME，则你可以让它在战场上来开始游戏。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·326 | Leyline of the Void | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果某张牌将从任何区域置入对手的坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·326 | Leyline of the Void | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Where treachery and oblivion converge.
trans-unit.target: 背叛与遗忘交会之处。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·327 | Liliana's Triumph | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Liliana's Triumph
trans-unit.target: 莉莲娜得胜

trans-unit.resname: TSR·327 | Liliana's Triumph | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a Liliana planeswalker, each opponent also discards a card.
trans-unit.target: 每位对手各牺牲一个生物。如果你操控莉莲娜鹏洛客，则每位对手再各弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·327 | Liliana's Triumph | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Her triumph came not from escaping her death, but in claiming her independence.
trans-unit.target: 她的胜利并非源自幸免死亡，而是源自重获自由。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·328 | Read the Bones | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Read the Bones
trans-unit.target: 解读骨卦

trans-unit.resname: TSR·328 | Read the Bones | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 占卜2，然后抓两张牌。你失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·328 | Read the Bones | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.
trans-unit.target: 逝者晓得生者尚未领悟的教训。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·329 | Relentless Rats | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Relentless Rats
trans-unit.target: 无情鼠群

trans-unit.resname: TSR·329 | Relentless Rats | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield named CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 战场上每有一个名称为CARDNAME的其他生物，CARDNAME便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·329 | Relentless Rats | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: A deck can have any number of cards named CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 名称为CARDNAME的牌，在套牌中之数量不受限制。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·330 | Sanguine Bond | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sanguine Bond
trans-unit.target: 血色羁绊

trans-unit.resname: TSR·330 | Sanguine Bond | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.
trans-unit.target: 每当你获得生命时，目标对手失去等量的生命。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·330 | Sanguine Bond | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Blood is constant. Every drop I drink, someone must bleed."\n—Vradeen, vampire nocturnus
trans-unit.target: 「血量是个定数。我喝的每滴血都流自别人身上。」\n～暗夜吸血鬼法迪

trans-unit.resname: TSR·331 | Shriekmaw | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shriekmaw
trans-unit.target: 尖吼怪

trans-unit.resname: TSR·331 | Shriekmaw | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
trans-unit.target: 恐惧（此生物只能被神器生物和／或黑色生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·331 | Shriekmaw | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，消灭目标非神器且非黑色的生物。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·331 | Shriekmaw | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Evoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
trans-unit.target: 呼魂{1}{B}（你可以支付此咒语的呼魂费用来施放它。若你如此作，当它进战场时便牺牲之。）

trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一生物造成战斗伤害时，消灭该生物。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·332 | Stinkweed Imp | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Dredge 5 (If you would draw a card, you may mill five cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)
trans-unit.target: 发掘5（若你将抓一张牌，则你可以改为磨五张牌。如果你如此作，则将此牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。）

trans-unit.source: Tasigur, the Golden Fang
trans-unit.target: 金牙塔西格

trans-unit.source: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
trans-unit.target: 掘穴（你于施放此咒语时每从你坟墓场中放逐一张牌，就能为此咒语支付{1}。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·333 | Tasigur, the Golden Fang | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{GW}{GW}: Mill two cards, then return a nonland card of an opponent's choice from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: {2}{G/U}{G/U}：磨两张牌，然后任一对手选择你坟墓场中的一张非地牌，将该牌从该处移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·334 | Thoughtseize | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thoughtseize
trans-unit.target: 攫取思绪

trans-unit.resname: TSR·334 | Thoughtseize | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张非地牌。该牌手弃掉该牌。你失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·334 | Thoughtseize | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Any dream is a robust harvest. Still, I prefer the timeworn dreams, heavy with import, that haunt the obsessive mind."
trans-unit.target: 「任何眠梦都是醇厚的收获。不过，我还是偏好被时间消蚀、折磨着受苦心灵又充满含义的梦想。」

trans-unit.resname: TSR·335 | Vampire Hexmage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vampire Hexmage
trans-unit.target: 邪术吸血鬼

trans-unit.source: First strike
trans-unit.target: 先攻

trans-unit.resname: TSR·335 | Vampire Hexmage | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: Remove all counters from target permanent.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：移去目标永久物上的所有指示物。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·335 | Vampire Hexmage | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When the blood hunt lost its thrill, she looked for less tangible means of domination.
trans-unit.target: 当鲜血狩猎失去了刺激感，她便开始寻求不那么具象的支配方式。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·336 | Yawgmoth, Thran Physician | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Yawgmoth, Thran Physician
trans-unit.target: 索蓝医师约格莫夫

trans-unit.resname: TSR·336 | Yawgmoth, Thran Physician | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 反人类保护

trans-unit.resname: TSR·336 | Yawgmoth, Thran Physician | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Pay 1 life, Sacrifice another creature: Put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature and draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 支付1点生命，牺牲另一个生物：在至多一个目标生物上放置一个-1/-1指示物且抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·336 | Yawgmoth, Thran Physician | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {B}{B}, Discard a card: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
trans-unit.target: {B}{B}，弃一张牌：增殖。（选择任意数量的永久物和／或牌手，然后为其已有之每种指示物各多放置一个同类的指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·337 | Zulaport Cutthroat | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Zulaport Cutthroat
trans-unit.target: 筑拉波割喉客

trans-unit.resname: TSR·337 | Zulaport Cutthroat | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个由你操控的生物死去时，每位对手各失去1点生命，且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·337 | Zulaport Cutthroat | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Eldrazi? Ha! Try walking through Zulaport at night with your pockets full. Now *that's* dangerous."
trans-unit.target: 「奥札奇？呵呵！不妨腰缠万贯时在夜晚来筑拉波走一遭。*这*才叫危险。」

trans-unit.resname: TSR·338 | Alesha, Who Smiles at Death | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Alesha, Who Smiles at Death
trans-unit.target: 蔑死者阿列莎

trans-unit.resname: TSR·338 | Alesha, Who Smiles at Death | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: First strike
trans-unit.target: 先攻

trans-unit.resname: TSR·338 | Alesha, Who Smiles at Death | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may pay {WB}{WB}. If you do, return target creature card with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以支付{W/B}{W/B}。若你如此作，则将目标力量等于或小于2的生物牌从你的坟墓场横置移回战场且正进行攻击。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·338 | Alesha, Who Smiles at Death | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Greet death with sword in hand."
trans-unit.target: 「持剑在手，笑迎死亡。」

trans-unit.resname: TSR·339 | Anger of the Gods | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Anger of the Gods
trans-unit.target: 众神之怒

trans-unit.resname: TSR·339 | Anger of the Gods | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对每个生物各造成3点伤害。如果本回合中曾以此法受到伤害的生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·339 | Anger of the Gods | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There was no reason to pray. This was already an act of the gods.
trans-unit.target: 祈祷已了无意义。因为这就是天意。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·340 | Bedlam Reveler | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bedlam Reveler
trans-unit.target: 骚乱欢魔

trans-unit.resname: TSR·340 | Bedlam Reveler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 你坟墓场中每有一张瞬间与法术牌，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·340 | Bedlam Reveler | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Prowess
trans-unit.target: 灵技

trans-unit.resname: TSR·340 | Bedlam Reveler | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, discard your hand, then draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，弃掉你的手牌，然后抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·341 | Dreadhorde Arcanist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dreadhorde Arcanist
trans-unit.target: 震惧军奥术师

trans-unit.resname: TSR·341 | Dreadhorde Arcanist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Trample
trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.resname: TSR·341 | Dreadhorde Arcanist | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with converted mana cost less than or equal to CARDNAME's power from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that card would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，选择目标在你坟墓场中且总法术力费用等于或小于CARDNAME力量的瞬间或法术牌。你可以从该处施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。如果该牌于本回合中将置入你的坟墓场，则改为将其放逐。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·342 | Etali, Primal Storm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Etali, Primal Storm
trans-unit.target: 始啸埃泰力

trans-unit.resname: TSR·342 | Etali, Primal Storm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, exile the top card of each player's library, then you may cast any number of spells from among those cards without paying their mana costs.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，放逐每位牌手的牌库顶牌，然后你可以从这些牌之中施放任意数量的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·342 | Etali, Primal Storm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The storm rages and the earth breaks.
trans-unit.target: 风暴肆虐，大地开裂。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·343 | Exquisite Firecraft | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Exquisite Firecraft
trans-unit.target: 精巧火术

trans-unit.resname: TSR·343 | Exquisite Firecraft | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成4点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·343 | Exquisite Firecraft | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, this spell can't be countered.
trans-unit.target: 精熟咒语～如果你坟墓场中有两张或更多的瞬间和／或法术牌，则此咒语不能被反击。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·343 | Exquisite Firecraft | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Chandra's gift set her apart and others aflame.
trans-unit.target: 茜卓的天赋让她孑然独立，使他人着火燃烧。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·344 | Feldon of the Third Path | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Feldon of the Third Path
trans-unit.target: 蹊径会的费顿

trans-unit.resname: TSR·344 | Feldon of the Third Path | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: {2}{R}，{T}：派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为目标在你坟墓场中的生物牌之复制品，但它额外具有神器此类别。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它牺牲。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·344 | Feldon of the Third Path | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "She will come back to me."

trans-unit.resname: TSR·345 | Goblin Engineer | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: Haste

trans-unit.resname: TSR·347 | Lava Spike | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lava Spike
trans-unit.target: 熔岩击

trans-unit.resname: TSR·347 | Lava Spike | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some kami attacks during the war were rife with trickery, subterfuge, and subtlety, draining hope and pride from the mortal world. Other attacks were a lot more straightforward.
trans-unit.target: 在战时，一些神明专长用诈术，遁辞，以及狡猾来分化民心、侵蚀战意。其他神明的攻击则简洁得多。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·348 | Molten Rain | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 融铁雨

trans-unit.target: 消灭目标地。如果该地为非基本地，则CARDNAME对该地的操控者造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·348 | Molten Rain | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When the molten rains fall, entire landscapes melt and flow away in rivulets of fire.
trans-unit.target: 当融铁雨降下，整个地景为之融化，形成火焰细流。

trans-unit.source: The calligraphy of combat is written with strokes of sudden blood.

trans-unit.target: 返照{4}{R}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.target: 威猛～如果你操控力量等于或大于4的生物，则受影响的生物再获得践踏异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·352 | Vandalblast | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Beauty is in the eye of the exploder.

trans-unit.resname: TSR·353 | Young Pyromancer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Immolation is the sincerest form of flattery.

trans-unit.target: 唤醒古物

trans-unit.resname: TSR·355 | Ancient Stirrings | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的五张牌。你可以展示其中的一张无色牌，并将它置于你手上。然后将其余的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·356 | Beast Whisperer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Beast Whisperer

trans-unit.resname: TSR·356 | Beast Whisperer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The tiniest mouse speaks louder to me than all the festival crowds on Tin Street."
trans-unit.target: 「对我来说，再小的老鼠口中话语之声，都比整条锡街的喧闹狂欢来得响亮。」

trans-unit.resname: TSR·357 | Beast Within | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Kill the weak so they can't drag the strong down to their level. This is true compassion."\n—Benzir, archdruid of Temple Might
trans-unit.target: 「把弱者杀掉，免得拖累强者。这才是真正的慈悲。」\n～力量神殿高位德鲁伊班极

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G}.

trans-unit.resname: TSR·360 | Elvish Mystic | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Life grows everywhere. My kin merely find those places where it grows strongest."\n—Nissa Revane
trans-unit.target: 「生命在各处成长。我的族人只是在寻找成长最旺的地方。」\n～妮莎瑞文

trans-unit.resname: TSR·361 | Eternal Witness | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She remembers every word spoken, from the hero's oath to the baby's cry.
trans-unit.target: 从英雄誓词以至婴儿哭啼，曾被言说的每字每句均永志其心。

trans-unit.target: {G}，牺牲一个生物：从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张生物牌为止。将该牌置于你手上，并将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.source: The essence of nature is change.

trans-unit.resname: TSR·363 | Farseek | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张平原，海岛，沼泽或山脉牌，并将之横置放进战场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·363 | Farseek | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."
trans-unit.target: 「这城市究竟广大到什么地步呢？我已旅行了那么远，看了那么多，却还没找到毫无建物的地方。」

trans-unit.resname: TSR·364 | Nature's Claim | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The timeless, tireless jaws of nature shall one day devour us all."\n—Sildark, artificer of Omu
trans-unit.target: 「大自然永无止境的胃口总有一天会将我们全数吞噬。」\n～欧穆城神器师西尔达

trans-unit.resname: TSR·366 | Reclamation Sage | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 「无论是由石匠塑造，由铁匠锻造，或由法师赐予生命者，我都会让它们重归大地怀抱。」

trans-unit.target: 森林占卜

trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张地牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·367 | Sylvan Scrying | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "As long as there is a single shred of life, there is hope."\n—Nissa Revane
trans-unit.target: 「只要有一丝生命存在，就有希望。」\n～妮莎瑞文

trans-unit.resname: TSR·369 | Time of Need | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "When the kumo attacked the monks' sacred shrine, a mournful toll for help echoed through the forest. Thus began the Battle of Silk, which would last six years."\n—*Great Battles of Kamigawa*
trans-unit.target: 「蜘蛛攻击修行僧圣坛时，求援的悲伤钟鸣回荡林间；从此展开了历时六年的蛛网之战。」\n*～神河战记*

trans-unit.target: 消灭目标总法术力费用等于或小于3的非地永久物。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·370 | Abrupt Decay | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Izzet quickly suspended their policy of lifetime guarantees.
trans-unit.target: 伊捷联盟很快停止了他们的终生保证政策。

trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒

trans-unit.resname: TSR·371 | Arcades, the Strategist | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature with defender enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个具守军异能的生物在你的操控下进战场时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·371 | Arcades, the Strategist | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Each creature you control with defender assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power and can attack as though it didn't have defender.
trans-unit.target: 每个由你操控且具守军异能的生物皆依照其防御力来分配战斗伤害，而不是依照力量；且能视同不具守军异能地进行攻击。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·372 | Bloodbraid Elf | Card Name

trans-unit.source: Haste
trans-unit.target: 敏捷

trans-unit.resname: TSR·372 | Bloodbraid Elf | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: 倾曳（当你施放此咒语时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张费用比此咒语低的非地牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。将所放逐的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: TSR·373 | Cloudshredder Sliver | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cloudshredder Sliver

trans-unit.resname: TSR·373 | Cloudshredder Sliver | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.resname: TSR·373 | Cloudshredder Sliver | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Forked tails rustled. Talons clicked. A lone sliver streaked overhead like jagged lightning, and the hive thundered.
trans-unit.target: 叉尾沙沙作响。利爪喀嚓不断。一个裂片妖闪电般掠过长空，整个母巢雷动。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·374 | Consuming Aberration | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Consuming Aberration
trans-unit.target: 吞噬畸变体

trans-unit.resname: TSR·374 | Consuming Aberration | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: This spell can't be countered.

trans-unit.source: "I see you've learned nothing, Chandra. You'd still put a match to something rather than understand it."
trans-unit.target: 「你好像没有吸取教训，茜卓。你还是想把问题一烧了事，而从没尝试着去了解它。」

trans-unit.resname: TSR·376 | Epic Experiment | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Epic Experiment
trans-unit.target: 壮绝实验

trans-unit.resname: TSR·376 | Epic Experiment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile the top X cards of your library. You may cast instant and sorcery spells with converted mana cost X or less from among them without paying their mana costs. Then put all cards exiled this way that weren't cast into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 放逐你牌库顶的X张牌。你可以施放其中总法术力费用等于或小于X的瞬间和法术咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。然后将所有以此法放逐且未施放的牌置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: TSR·377 | Feather, the Redeemed | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Feather, the Redeemed
trans-unit.target: 复耀飞羽

trans-unit.resname: TSR·377 | Feather, the Redeemed | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: TSR·377 | Feather, the Redeemed | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets a creature you control, exile that card instead of putting it into your graveyard as it resolves. If you do, return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放一个以由你操控之生物为目标的瞬间或法术咒语，于该咒语结算时，改为放逐该牌，而非将其置入你的坟墓场。若你如此作，则在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它移回你手上。
